reviews.review: V社游戏总爱做一些阴间场景。我们不去莱温霍姆那一章小时候真吓尿我了，也就因为这样从那一关之后就一直没玩过，直到现在才来还愿

A splendid game that will stand the test of time!
Игра просто отличная, купил поиграл понастольгировал!!! Даже сейчас в 2021 году играбельна!

Sempre tive o sonho de jogar, mas nunca tive um computador bom. Atualmente comprei um notebook e admito que valeu a pena esperar todo esse tempo! O jogo, apesar de antigo, ainda me causa uma sensação muito boa para jogar e ainda me surpreendo com os detalhes de cada cenário.
Good story and fun to play
Good Plot, but things can glitch out sometimes
半条命2在半条命1发售的6年后发售，半条命2的画质对于1来说有很大的进步，不只在物理引擎上。还有更新的玩法，他的画质和玩法放到现在我都无法相信这是一个17年前的游戏

Damn, time flies. This game is legendary for so many reasons i cant even comprehend yet. Where to start and where to finish with this gem of the old world. One thing is for sure, this game is the pioneer behind the valve engine and all of the games that operate on that same engine for so long. Though this game is nostalgia fuel for the old and naive gamers of the past, there are sure a few things to learn even to this day from this game. What else can i say about this masterpiece, im just a humble russian president.

Yours sincerely 
Vladimir Putin

Secuela del clásico half life. Un shooter de la vieja escuela. Rejugandolo y pasandolo como un niño.
It's a long game for your money. The story is interesting a pretty detailed. There are lots of user downloadable add-ons with varying lengths and added story on some.

El juego es divertido y para nada demandante de recursos, tiene mecanicas interesantes y una buena historia. Si lo ves en oferta aprovecha (Aunque tambien recomiendo el pack Valve que lo incluye). Lo único malo es que apenas lo inicias tiene la limitación a 300fps que son totalmente innecesarios y tenes que limitarlos a 60 a través de la consola de programador para no exigir de más a tus componentes.

I thought all the hype about this game was due to nostalgia, but I was wrong. 

10/10.

very fun game, the combat, amd the story

the only big downsides are the lack of a soundtrack playing, it makes the game feel empty, and that the higher definition shaders are automatically turned off, i played through half the game without knowing that was a option (pun intended)
esse jogo e a oitava arte do mundo dos games
ахуенная игра, хоть прошел уже ее много раз

el juego esta chevere ya que me cuenta mas de lo que pasa en half life ya que ya pase half life 1 tambien tengo en episodio 1 y 2 pero primero quiero completar esta para luego jugar el cap 1 y 2, tambien quiero jugar halyx espero que lo sacen en descuento♣○◘•

As old as this game may be getting to play it in the world of today doesnt change the fact that this is a strong 10/10. the story keeps you coming for more and the missions are actually interesting and fun to do. There are barely any tedious tasks you have to do which drags the game on and the weapons are hella fun to use, its a literal sandbox with plot. this game is a amazing experience to sit through and it is worth every penny. not a lot of games these days are doing what half life could
这是我玩过最好玩的剧情游戏了。gman给老子数3!!

Ho giocato l'intera saga di Half-Life (tranne Alyx) nel 2021 e ho capito che ho fatto benissimo a recuperarla. Il secondo capitolo dà gli schiaffi a molti giochi che escono negli ultimi anni. Visionario.
Half-Life 2 è sicuramente ancora un must have che tutti dovrebbero giocare.

Half-Life é como vinho; quanto mais velho, melhor o gosto.
 Bem, considerando que hoje em dia é raro ver jogos novos bons, se você não tiver muito o que jogar ou seu pc é movido a hamster com uma batata como fonte de energia, eu recomendaria você experimentar esta sequela da franquia; mesmo sendo bem antigo, eu particularmente acho que vale a pena
This is the game that changed my whole perspective about gaming in general. Thank you Valve.

It starts with one

It doesn't even matter how hard you try

Of a time when I tried so hard
